00028 class ApproxsimMessage {
00029 protected:
00030      virtual void openMessage(std::ostream &o, const std::string &type) const;
00031      virtual void closeMessage(std::ostream &o) const;
00032 public:
00034      virtual ~ApproxsimMessage() {}

00042      virtual void toXML(std::ostream &o) const = 0;
00043 };

00122 class StatusMessage : public ApproxsimMessage {
00123 private:
00125      const std::string mType;
00126 
00131      std::vector<Error> mErrors;
00132 
00133 public:
00139      StatusMessage(const std::string &type) : mType(type) {}
00140

00159 class UpdateMessage : public ApproxsimMessage {
00160 private:
00161      Buffer& mBuf;   
00162      ChangeTrackerAdapter& mChangeTracker;   
00163      
00168      bool mRegisteredForUpdates;
00169 
00174      std::vector<Subscription*> mSubscriptions;
00175 
00180      mutable Time mValidForTime;
00181 public:
00189      UpdateMessage(Buffer& b, ChangeTrackerAdapter& c, bool r)
00190           : mBuf(b), mChangeTracker(c), mRegisteredForUpdates(r) {}
00191 
00199      Time validForTime() const { return mValidForTime; }
00200 
00206      void addSubscription(Subscription *s) { mSubscriptions.push_back(s); }
00207 
00208      void toXML(std::ostream &o) const;
00209 };
